headline: Accelsius Closes $65 Million Series B Funding Led by Johnson Controls; Legrand Joining Round to Scale Liquid Cooling for Gigawatt-Class AI Factories
summary: AUSTIN, Texas, January 12, 2026--Accelsius announces its closed Series B funding round.

raw.headline: Accelsius Closes $65 Million Series B Funding Led by Johnson Controls; Legrand Joining Round to Scale Liquid Cooling for Gigawatt-Class AI Factories

headline: Sensormatic Solutions Adds PaaS to TrueVUE Cloud, Designed to Make RFID Inventory Management Easier for Retailers Using Their Own Cloud Services
summary: NEUHAUSEN, Switzerland, January 12, 2026--Sensormatic Solutions, the leading global retail solutions portfolio of Johnson Controls (NYSE: JCI), today announced the release of a new option for retailers looking to gain inventory and operational visibility via its TrueVUE Cloud solution. Its leading inventory intelligence solution is now available as a platform-as-a-service (PaaS) offering, designed for retailers who want to integrate the powerful inventory management capabilities of TrueVUE Cloud
